title: Border, 1700–50
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace, Brussels style
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: A scalloped border with a serpentine arrangement of flowers and fruits. Fond: droschel. Modes: portes, brides picotées.
